input.sentences: we went to a beachside seafood restaurant for dinner .
they offered many fresh options of locally caught seafood .
the shrimp were so fresh and delicious .
we had fresh flounder for our entree and i 've never had better .
we will be returning to location on future visits to this area .
output.sentences: The seafood restaurant had a beautiful view at dinner time as the sun dropped toward the ocean.
The restaurant offered many options for their fresh seafood, making it difficult to choose.
The waitress was pleasant and suggested the shrimp scampi as it was extremely fresh and delicious.
If shellfish were not the first choice, she suggested we try the flounder as our entree as it was also cooked to perfection and fresh.
We knew we would return for many visits to this restaurant due to the spectacular location and savory dishes.
